thread.title: Watch Trump make an announcement on tariffs

author: Jacob Pramuk
title: Watch Trump make an announcement on tariffs
text:
Watch Trump make an announcement on tariffs Updated Moments Ago CNBC.com 
[The stream is slated to start at 11 a.m., ET. Please refresh the page if you do not see a player above at that time.] 
President Donald Trump is scheduled to announce tariffs on Thursday. 
While a White House official would not specifically say what the president plans to announce, reports indicate he could target steel and aluminum imports. 
The Commerce Department previously recommended tariffs as a matter of national security. 
Read more:
